title: [Sponsor] HEY Calendar
content:
A few years ago, HEY shook the email world with a fresh take on a category that was left for dead.

And now we’ve done the same with calendaring.

The all-new HEY Calendar brings flexibility, personality, and a radical new point of view to the boring old grid of dates.

So now HEY’s both email and a calendar, all-in-one. Check out how much better things can be at HEY.com.

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
